original_text: My Christian friends, this is what I am saying to you: It is good when you want to speak clear messages from God. And if anyone has the gift to speak in a special language, do not stop them. My Christian friends, this is what I am saying to you: It is good when you want to speak clear messages from God. And if anyone has the gift to speak in a special language, do not stop them.
korean_text: 그런즉 내 형제들아 예언하기를 사모하며 방언 말하기를 금하지 말라

sentences.original_text: this is what I am saying to you
It is good when you want to speak clear messages
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 명확한 메시지를 전하고자 할 때 좋다

sentences.original_text: And if anyone has the gift
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 누군가 은사를 가지고 있다면

sentences.original_text: to speak in a special language
